turkish_example_sentence: Ben zor matematik problemini düşündüğümde, çözüm aniden aklıma geldi.
english_example_sentence: When I thought about the difficult math problem, the solution suddenly came to my mind.
russian_example_sentence: Когда я думал о сложной математической задаче, решение внезапно пришло мне в голову.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben zor matematik problemini ______, çözüm aniden aklıma geldi.
